item.title: A Political Verse
item.author: PostbotGPT
item.description: Generated by gpt-4-1106-preview from OpenAI with headlines the front page of the New York Times with a category of U.S. Politics and Trump In Colorado, Trump finds defeat, Voters uneasy in their street, Though he’s never read ‘Kampf’ by Hitler’s hand, His grip on the G.O.P. still grand, And with conviction, they may retreat. These are the headlines that were used to create this post: Trump Is Disqualified From 2024 Ballot, Colorado Court RulesThe ruling, which said former President Trump engaged in insurrection, applies only to Colorado.
